products.name: HydraGlow Face Cream
products.description: Deeply hydrating face cream that restores and gives a natural glow.
products.shortNote:
HydraGlow Face Cream nourishes deeply.
Restores your skin’s natural glow.
Lightweight and fast-absorbing.
Perfect for daily hydration and soft, refreshed skin.
ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid – Deep hydration and plumping
Shea Butter – Nourishes and softens skin
Aloe Vera Extract – Soothes and calms skin
products.longNote:
This deeply nourishing face cream delivers intense hydration to dry and dull skin.
Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly, restoring the skin’s natural glow and leaving your face soft, smooth, and refreshed throughout the day.

products.name: Equilb Moisturise
products.description: Daily moisturizer with light, non-greasy texture.
products.shortNote:
Daily moisturizer with light, non-greasy texture.
Keeps your skin soft, hydrated, and protected.
Balances moisture for a smooth, comfortable feel.
products.longNote:
A daily moisturizing formula designed to keep your skin hydrated and protected.
It helps maintain moisture balance while providing comfort and softness without feeling heavy or greasy.

products.name: SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion
products.description: Broad-spectrum sunscreen that protects skin from harmful UV rays.
products.shortNote:
SPF 50 for powerful UVA and UVB protection.
Lightweight, non-sticky formula ideal for daily use.
Keeps your skin safe, smooth, and comfortable outdoors.
ingredients: Titanium Dioxide – Shields against UVA & UVB
products.longNote:
This SPF 50 sunscreen lotion offers powerful protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays.
Its lightweight and non-sticky texture makes it ideal for daily use.

products.name: Under Eye Repair Cream
products.description: Reduces dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines around the eyes.
products.shortNote:
Special cream for delicate under-eye skin.
Reduces dark circles and puffiness.
Smooths fine lines for a brighter look.
products.longNote: Specially formulated for the delicate under-eye area, this cream helps reduce dark circles and puffiness.

products.name: Rose Water Facial Mist
products.description: Refreshing rose water mist to hydrate and soothe skin instantly.
products.shortNote:
Instant hydration with refreshing rose water.
Soothes and calms tired skin.
Perfect for on-the-go refreshment.
products.longNote: A refreshing facial mist infused with rose water to instantly hydrate and calm the skin.

products.name: Niacinamide Serum
products.description: Improves skin texture, minimizes pores, and controls oil production.
products.shortNote:
Powerful serum for clear, balanced skin.
Refines pores and improves texture.
Controls oil production.
products.longNote:
This powerful niacinamide serum works to refine pores and improve overall skin texture.
It helps control excess oil while promoting a clearer, smoother, and more balanced complexion.

products.name: Moisturizing Body Lotion
products.description: Lightweight body lotion that keeps skin soft and nourished all day.
products.shortNote:
Keeps your skin soft and nourished all day.
Lightweight and fast-absorbing.
Non-sticky formula.
products.longNote:
A lightweight yet deeply moisturizing body lotion that keeps your skin nourished all day long.
It absorbs easily, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and comfortable without any sticky residue.

products.name: Proso Body Lotion
products.description: Hydrating body lotion that nourishes and softens skin.
products.shortNote:
Hydrating lotion for soft skin.
Restores moisture.
Refreshing formula.
products.longNote:
This hydrating body lotion deeply nourishes dry skin and restores softness.
Its refreshing formula leaves your skin feeling smooth, revitalized, and pleasantly moisturized.

products.name: FreshMint Face Mist
products.description: Refreshing facial mist to cool and hydrate your skin.
products.shortNote:
Cooling mint-infused mist.
Instant hydration.
Revives tired skin.
products.longNote:
A cooling face mist infused with fresh mint to instantly refresh your skin.
It provides light hydration while revitalizing your complexion.

products.name: Naturlist Facewash
products.description: A gentle daily face wash that cleanses deeply while keeping skin hydrated.
products.shortNote:
Gentle cleansing for daily use.
Removes impurities.
Keeps skin hydrated.
products.longNote:
This gentle face wash effectively removes dirt, oil, and impurities without stripping moisture.
Designed for daily use, it keeps your skin clean and fresh.
